fields.name: abstract_paintings
fields.description: Abstract Paintings focus on visual language of shape, form, color, and line to create compositions independent from visual references in the world.

fields.name: landscape_paintings
fields.description: Landscape Paintings depict the beauty of nature, from vast valleys to tranquil lakes, capturing the essence of the outdoors.

fields.name: portrait_paintings
fields.description: Portrait Paintings focus on depicting the appearance, personality, and even the mood of the person being portrayed.

fields.name: street_art
fields.description: Street Art is a vibrant and dynamic form of artistic expression that takes place in public spaces, often with a strong message or social commentary.

fields.name: pop_art
fields.description: Pop Art is an art movement that challenges traditional fine art by incorporating imagery from popular and mass culture, such as advertising, comic books, and mundane cultural objects.

fields.name: modern_paintings
fields.description: Modern Paintings break away from traditional styles, experimenting with new ways of seeing and with fresh ideas about the nature of materials and functions of art.

fields.name: new_arrivals
fields.description: New Arrivals feature the latest and most innovative works from emerging and established artists, showcasing contemporary trends and styles.
